description:
Emura Akane, Shiina Kuroko, and Hiiragi Himeko are hanging out in the classroom
after school when Yoshiko sets her sights on them. The girls, completely unable
to read Yoshiko`s behavior, get roped into playing with her. They agree to play
hide and seek in order to escape Yoshiko, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ギャルが! アホガール
